name: 黃乾怡
objective:
針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting..

Train students with the capability of collecting, studying and presenting the journal papers.
schedule:
Weeks 1-18
Students will be arranged in group and present high quality SCI/SSCI journal papers.
